PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryEdgeFixingPlate
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties specific to edge fixing plates.

PropertyDef.Name: EdgeFixingPlateLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the L-shaped edge plate.

PropertyDef.Name: EdgeFixingPlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the L-shaped edge plate.

PropertyDef.Name: EdgeFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneZ
PropertyDef.Definition: The flange width of the L-shaped edge plate in plane Z.

PropertyDef.Name: EdgeFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneX
PropertyDef.Definition: The flange width of the L-shaped edge plate in plane X.
